OOC: Tucson and Night Shift are still within the vicinity of the Ark, but j=
ust about a hundred to two hundred feet away.  They didn't get far before t=
hey started to battle, yet Nightshift was transmitting a message to Hydras.=
  His transmission range is extensive.  

BIC: Tucson makes for a make shif=
t, mid transformation sequence, as instructed by Lord Elder.

"Sorry about =
that Sir, I shouldn't have assumed you had the capability.  You're right, t=
his should be convincing enough." 

Half robot, half SUV, Tucson now falls =
to the ground, as if going unconcious.  Walking further ahead, with a slow =
limp, Night Shift puts a little distance between himself and Tucson before =
falling painfully to the ground, waiting for help to arrive.

--- In nbwrpg=
@yahoogroups.com, Preston Carroll <supercyclonus@...> wrote:
>
> > While ly=
ing on the ground, Tucson picks up Lord Elder's transmission.
> >
> > " I c=
opy that, Lord Elder... I know just the thing too. By the way, I need you t=
o activate a holographic field on me. As far as Hydras knows, Night Shift h=
as mutilated me to the point of irecognizable proportions. I need a hologra=
m of me in a dismantled state of being. That should also draw out who's hid=
ing behind the cloaked field. Tucson out."
> 
> Lord Elder get's a confused=
 look on his face, "He wants a holographic
> projection?" He looked over at=
 Elita for a moment and then back at the
> terminal in front of him. "He di=
dn't mention that in the planning
> stages. If we could do that we could ha=
ve hidden the Ark with it."
> Elder grumbled under his breath. "it's not as=
 if Mirage or Hound are
> standing here at my back."
> 
> Reopening the com=
munication link Elder spoke, "We don't have a
> projector. Maybe try landin=
g in mid transformation? It may look
> convincing if they don't look hard e=
nough." He shook his head tiredly
> as he waited for a response.
> 
> (TAG)=

> 
> OOC: By the way, where is this taking place? Right outside the Ark,
>=
 near the Hydras' base or somewhere in between? I wasn't quite sure. I
> th=
ink I thought you were near Hydras' base.
> 
> Preston
